column6: a gas explosion caused a fire to erupt in a temporary kitchen in Toul Sangke 1
column8: Phnom Penh.------Early reports suggest two people were either injured or have died. Fire trucks are now intervening at the scene.------Updates to follow. ------POST NEWS------UPDATE: The two injured people were named as Sok Ngoun
column10: a chef from Por Sen Chey district
column11: (foot and leg injuries) and Sok Sok Try
column14: (injuries to face and limbs). The victims were treated at Sorya Clinic East of Sam Han Market.------The fire was caused by a gas leak at a birthday/house warming party.
